description:
Secure yourself quickly and easily at anchors. This adjustable lanyard allows you to anchor yourself where you need to be with a simple pull of the rope. It uses a short piece of the Edelrid Swift dynamic rope to absorbs energy in case you slip while it's unweighted.

  • Dynamic Swift Pro Dry 8.9mm rope is adjustable from 15 to 120cm
  • Rope clamp is adjustable even under load
  • Includes Kiwi Screwgate carabiner
  • Secures to harness belay loop with girth hitch
name: Edelrid Switch Adjust Lanyard
